name: GPT Repository Access
description: Vecto Pilot AI (GPT-5) plans, diffs, commits and PRs. Tokens stay in the browser.
longDescription: Vecto Pilot AI Assistant (GPT-5) that can read your repo, generate plans, produce diffs, commit, and open PRs. All access tokens are stored in the browser session; no server-side storage. Includes diff review, SVG editor, SQL viewer, and diagnostics panes.

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read files to analyze, plan, and generate diffs

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Write code, run tests/linters, and apply patches

scopes.name: experimental-api
scopes.reason: Enable newer Replit APIs used by the assistant
